DESCRIPTION: Add the card to the Sequence. NL When 3 cards are in the Sequence, their effects (other than Encode) are merged into a Function with cost equal to the highest cost card in the Sequence.
An additional effect that triggers when this card, while in the Sequence, is combined into a Function. NL Can be a negative effect, which is referred to as an 'Error'.
Do not lose Block at the end of the turn.
Shuffle a card into your draw pile.
Discard a card, drawing a new card to replace it.
